sentences.sentence: Isolationism is also on the rise.
Isolationism is trying to police the world but creating more resentment than gratitude.
sentences.translation: 孤立主义意味着企图做世界警察却制造了更多的怨恨而非感激；

sentences.sentence: He warned that it would be a misinterpretation if anyone saw the US withdrawal as a move towards isolationism.
sentences.translation: 他提醒说把美军的撤出看作是孤立主义是一种误解。
